CustomField.description: This is computed as Total Allocated Hrs Remaining Minus Effort Hrs Remaining – Negative number implies a Deficit or Shortage, --Positive number implies a buffer
CustomField.formula: if ( Effort_Remaining1__c > Total_Allocation_Hrs_Remaining__c ,-Effort_Remaining1__c + Total_Allocation_Hrs_Remaining__c, Total_Allocation_Hrs_Remaining__c- Effort_Remaining1__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is computed as Total Allocated Hrs Remaining Minus Effort Hrs Remaining – Negative number implies a Deficit or Shortage, --Positive number implies a buffer
CustomField.label: Total Allocation Deficit/Buffer (Hrs)
